nodes.text: Ia Nirvin was a male Human diplomat and envoy of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY, he was sent by the Empire to Nal Hutta, in order to bid on several items that were offered by the Hutts in an auction and came from a spaceship named Cinzia. He was killed during the skirmish in Tassaa Bareesh's palace.
